title: Putting the Tea in Totenberg
description: Nina Totenberg joins the podcast to discuss her story that broke the Internet and sent the Court into a statement frenzy. Kate, Leah, and Melissa then break down some of the January arguments and what is happening with S.B. 8.
author: hey@crooked.com (Crooked Media)
